Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -98.2



Dear Sirs,



We believe that your company, The Planet Internet Services Inc, is
responsible for hosting the website found at www.mortgage-eloan.com
<http://www.mortgage-eloan.com/>.  This site is making unauthorized use of
Crystal Guides Limited intellectual property, namely the code, layout and
logo of our site www.uknetguide.co.uk <http://www.uknetguide.co.uk/>  and
constitutes unfair competition by implying a false connection with our
business.  This illegal copyright infringement violates applicable laws and
we request full contact information from you as a matter of urgency in
relation to the owner of the url mortgage-eloan.com.



Please forward the relevant details to this email address or call the
undersigned on +44 207 307 1292.



Kind regards,



Scott Kennedy

Managing Director

Crystal Guides Limited
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
